title: FS: T206 Devore Back Run of Five (including Red Hindu, AB460, S460)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Devore Back Run of Five (including Red Hindu, AB460, S460)
posts.post_content:
Well, I've got bigger fish to fry.  Started working on the EPDGs and a few other things, so these need to go.  Not interested in breaking it up at the moment.  Asking $450 for the mini-set... standard paypal preferred.

Of note... 
the Red Hindu is shellacked or varnished.  A TPG will not slab it, although I guarantee it is authentic.
the American Beauty 460 was in an SGC10 slab.

See all the scans here: [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/t206-devore[/url]
